effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Void Bolt at an enemy at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dark Ascension or Void Eruption always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! grants you 5.0 seconds of Power Infusion. Mind Blast, Void Blast, and Void Bolt deal 10% increased damage while Power Infusion is active.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to bring the candle to life, summoning a waxen ally to light up your enemies.

Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 520,505, and grants you up to 9,597 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,872 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
